name: Thief™ II: The Metal Age
descr: 关于这款游戏The ultimate thief is back! Tread softly as you make your way through 15 new complex, non-linear levels full of loot to steal and guards to outsmart.  Improved enemy AI, new  gadgets and a riveting story will draw you into the world of Thief™ II: The Metal Age, a place of powerful new technologies, fanatical religions and corruption.Key Features:Thrilling, stealth-based FPS gameplayComplex, non-linear levels allow you to choose a different path every timeAdvanced enemy AI and sophisticated new master thief tools to outwit themGripping narrative with intriguing subplots through 15 huge missionsAwardsHall of fame entry in GamespyGreatest Games of All Time entry in Gamespot3rd annual Academy of Interactive Arts and Sciences Awards (2000) - Outstanding Achievement in Character or Story Development
